metadata.title: CVE-2023-38057 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An improper input validation vulnerability in OTRS Survey modules allowsany attacker with a link to a valid and unanswered survey request to injectjavascript code in free text answers. This allows a cross site scriptingattack while reading the replies as authenticated agent. This issue affectsOTRS Survey module from 7.0.X before 7.0.32, from 8.0.X before 8.0.13 and((OTRS)) Community Edition Survey module from 6.0.X through 6.0.22.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
